sentences.sContent: So we play out this charade of happy families and most of the time life trundles along much as before, more or less happily.
sentences.sContent_eng: So we play out this charade of happy families and most of the time life trundles along much as before, more or less happily.
sentences.sCn: 因此我们维持着这字谜般的快乐家庭，大部分时候生活与以前没什么不同地——多多少少快乐地—— 向前滚动着。

trans.tranOther: a game in which one person uses actions and no words to show the meaning of a word or phrase, and other people have to guess what it is
